basic.description:
A study of composition with an emphasis on traditional and 20th-century techniques. 
NOTE  Students holding First-Class Honours standing in the Royal Conservatory Grade II Rudiments may enrol in the course with permission of the School.
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: Composition Seminar

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    A minimum grade of A- in MUSC P52/3.0
